amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used by the Department of Energy to fund the Wind Powering America Initiative.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Department of Energy to fund the Wind Powering America Initiative.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A062) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
